pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 20, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, July 20, 2016: 

Gatineau, Quebec

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks regarding the Canada Child Benefit (CCB). A media availability will follow.

Dinty's Restaurant
620 Chemin d'Aylmer
Gatineau, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks and media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

Media Appearances

7:30 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on Breakfast Television Toronto.

8:00 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CBC News Network.

8:15 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on RDI Matin.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
